44#ifndef MSPI_DEVICE_INIT_H
45#define MSPI_DEVICE_INIT_H
46
47#include "coremark_pro.h"
48
49#ifdef __cplusplus
50extern "C"
51{
52#endif
53
54#if defined(NOR_FLASH_ADESTO_ATXP032)
55 #include "am_devices_mspi_atxp032.h"
56 #define MSPI_FLASH_STATUS_SUCCESS AM_DEVICES_MSPI_ATXP032_STATUS_SUCCESS
57 #define MSPI_FLASH_STATUS_ERROR AM_DEVICES_MSPI_ATXP032_STATUS_ERROR
58 #define MSPI_FLASH_PAGE_SIZE AM_DEVICES_MSPI_ATXP032_PAGE_SIZE
59 #define MSPI_FLASH_SECTOR_SIZE AM_DEVICES_MSPI_ATXP032_SECTOR_SIZE
60 #define MSPI_FLASH_MAX_SECTORS AM_DEVICES_MSPI_ATXP032_MAX_SECTORS
61 #define am_devices_mspi_flash_config_t am_devices_mspi_atxp032_config_t
62 #define am_devices_mspi_flash_timing_config_t am_devices_mspi_atxp032_sdr_timing_config_t
63
64#elif defined(NAND_FLASH_DOSILICON_DS35X1GA)
65 #include "am_devices_mspi_ds35x1ga.h"
66 #define MSPI_FLASH_STATUS_SUCCESS AM_DEVICES_MSPI_DS35X1GA_STATUS_SUCCESS
67 #define MSPI_FLASH_STATUS_ERROR AM_DEVICES_MSPI_DS35X1GA_STATUS_ERROR
68 #define MSPI_FLASH_PAGE_SIZE AM_DEVICES_MSPI_DS35X1GA_PAGE_DATA_SIZE
69 #define MSPI_FLASH_SECTOR_SIZE AM_DEVICES_MSPI_DS35X1GA_BLOCK_SIZE
70 #define MSPI_FLASH_MAX_SECTORS AM_DEVICES_MSPI_DS35X1GA_MAX_BLOCKS
71 #define am_devices_mspi_flash_config_t am_devices_mspi_ds35x1ga_config_t
72 #define am_devices_mspi_flash_timing_config_t am_devices_mspi_ds35x1ga_sdr_timing_config_t
73#else
74 #define FLASH_ENABLE 0
75#endif
76
77#if defined(PSRAM_APS12808L)
78 #include "am_devices_mspi_psram_aps12808l.h"
79 #define MSPI_PSRAM_STATUS_SUCCESS AM_DEVICES_MSPI_PSRAM_STATUS_SUCCESS
80 #define MSPI_PSRAM_STATUS_ERROR AM_DEVICES_MSPI_PSRAM_STATUS_ERROR
81 #define am_devices_mspi_psram_config_t am_devices_mspi_psram_config_t
82
83#elif defined(PSRAM_APS25616N)
84 #include "am_devices_mspi_psram_aps25616n.h"
85 #define MSPI_PSRAM_STATUS_SUCCESS AM_DEVICES_MSPI_PSRAM_STATUS_SUCCESS
86 #define MSPI_PSRAM_STATUS_ERROR AM_DEVICES_MSPI_PSRAM_STATUS_ERROR
87 #define am_devices_mspi_psram_config_t am_devices_mspi_psram_config_t
88 #define am_devices_mspi_psram_timing_config_t am_devices_mspi_psram_ddr_timing_config_t
89#elif defined(PSRAM_APS25616BA)
90 #include "am_devices_mspi_psram_aps25616ba_1p2v.h"
91 #define MSPI_PSRAM_STATUS_SUCCESS AM_DEVICES_MSPI_PSRAM_STATUS_SUCCESS
92 #define MSPI_PSRAM_STATUS_ERROR AM_DEVICES_MSPI_PSRAM_STATUS_ERROR
93 #define am_devices_mspi_psram_config_t am_devices_mspi_psram_config_t
94 #define am_devices_mspi_psram_timing_config_t am_devices_mspi_psram_ddr_timing_config_t
95#else
96
97#endif

99//
100// Typedef - to encapsulate device driver functions
101//
102#if (FLASH_ENABLE != 0)
103typedef struct
104{
105 uint8_t devName[30];
106 uint32_t (*mspi_init)(uint32_t ui32Module, am_devices_mspi_flash_config_t *psMSPISettings, void **ppHandle, void **ppMspiHandle);
107 uint32_t (*mspi_term)(void *pHandle);
108
109
110 uint32_t (*mspi_read)(void *pHandle, uint8_t *pui8RxBuffer,
111 uint32_t ui32ReadAddress,
112 uint32_t ui32NumBytes,
113 bool bWaitForCompletion);
114
115
116 uint32_t (*mspi_write)(void *pHandle, uint8_t *ui8TxBuffer,
117 uint32_t ui32WriteAddress,
118 uint32_t ui32NumBytes,
119 bool bWaitForCompletion);
120
121
122
123 uint32_t (*mspi_mass_erase)(void *pHandle);
124 uint32_t (*mspi_sector_erase)(void *pHandle, uint32_t ui32SectorAddress);
125
126 uint32_t (*mspi_xip_enable)(void *pHandle);
127 uint32_t (*mspi_xip_disable)(void *pHandle);
128
129#if defined(am_devices_mspi_flash_timing_config_t)
130
131#if defined(NAND_FLASH_DOSILICON_DS35X1GA)
132 uint32_t (*mspi_init_timing_check)(uint32_t ui32Module,
133 const am_devices_mspi_flash_config_t *pDevCfg,
134 am_devices_mspi_flash_timing_config_t *pDevSdrCfg);
135#else
136 uint32_t (*mspi_init_timing_check)(uint32_t ui32Module,
137 am_devices_mspi_flash_config_t *pDevCfg,
138 am_devices_mspi_flash_timing_config_t *pDevSdrCfg);
139#endif
140 uint32_t (*mspi_init_timing_apply)(void *pHandle,
141 am_devices_mspi_flash_timing_config_t *pDevSdrCfg);
142#endif
143} mspi_flash_device_func_t;
144
145#endif
146//
147// Typedef - to encapsulate device driver functions
148//
149typedef struct
150{
151 uint8_t devName[30];
152 uint32_t (*mspi_init)(uint32_t ui32Module, am_devices_mspi_psram_config_t *psMSPISettings, void **ppHandle, void **ppMspiHandle);
153 uint32_t (*mspi_term)(void *pHandle);
154
155
156 uint32_t (*mspi_read)(void *pHandle, uint8_t *pui8RxBuffer,
157 uint32_t ui32ReadAddress,
158 uint32_t ui32NumBytes,
159 bool bWaitForCompletion);
160
161 uint32_t (*mspi_nonblocking_read)(void *pHandle,
162 uint8_t *pui8RxBuffer,
163 uint32_t ui32ReadAddress,
164 uint32_t ui32NumBytes,
165 am_hal_mspi_callback_t pfnCallback,
166 void *pCallbackCtxt);
167
168 uint32_t (*mspi_write)(void *pHandle, uint8_t *ui8TxBuffer,
169 uint32_t ui32WriteAddress,
170 uint32_t ui32NumBytes,
171 bool bWaitForCompletion);
172
173 uint32_t (*mspi_xip_enable)(void *pHandle);
174 uint32_t (*mspi_xip_disable)(void *pHandle);
175
176#if defined(am_devices_mspi_psram_timing_config_t)
177 uint32_t (*mspi_init_timing_check)(uint32_t ui32Module,
178 am_devices_mspi_psram_config_t *pDevCfg,
179 am_devices_mspi_psram_timing_config_t *pDevSdrCfg);
180 uint32_t (*mspi_init_timing_apply)(void *pHandle,
181 am_devices_mspi_psram_timing_config_t *pDevSdrCfg);
182#endif
183} mspi_psram_device_func_t;
184

190extern uint32_t mspi_psram_init(void);
191extern void mspi_psram_config_print(void);
192#ifdef __cplusplus
193}
194#endif

196#endif // MSPI_DEVICE_INIT_H
